title: Summary

conditions.term_1: Our general terms and conditions apply.
conditions.term_2: Hotel should be informed in case of late arrival.
conditions.term_3: Check in time to hotel is usually between 2pm and 4pm.
conditions.term_4: Minimum age to book a hotel room is 18 (in some countries 21).
conditions.term_5: In some Islamic world countries marriage certificate is needed to share a hotel room (for couples).
conditions.term_6: The cancellation policy and charges for each room are shown in the booking summary.
conditions.term_7: No Show incurs a 100% booking charge. No cancellation is allowed after check in.

placeholders.title: Title
placeholders.comment: Comment on hotel(arrival time, bed preferences, etc.) The information is sent directly to the hotel and hotellidiili.ee cannot guarantee the fulfillment of the wishes.

payment_confirmation: I agree with hotellidiilid.ee terms and conditions and privacy policy.
